sentences: Küladki on seal sootuks teiselaadsed kui meil. Teistsuguses ajastus ja teiselaadses keskkonnas oleks tast võinud prohvet saada.
Mujale maailma sõidame ikka uudistama, teiselaadset kogemust saama.
context: The word 'ajastus' in Estonian refers to a distinct era or period of time, often with unique characteristics that set it apart from other periods. It can also refer to a specific timeframe that has its own particular qualities or significance.
